title: $59+ O/W U.S. and International Summer-Flights Sale
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $59+ O/W U.S. and International Summer-Flights Sale $59+ O/W U.S. and International Summer-Flights Sale July 1, 2015 10:03am by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Alaska Airlines latest sale includes flights to various western cities, including Boise, Las Vegas, San Diego, and Seattle; plus some further afield and even international like Anchorage, Honolulu, and Mazatlan. Fares start at $59 one-way ($118 round-trip), and must be booked at least 14 days in advance and by 11:59 p.m. PT on July 6. 
The sale's travel windows are as follows:

Alaska Airlines latest sale includes flights to various western cities, including Boise, Las Vegas, San Diego, and Seattle; plus some further afield and even international like Anchorage, Honolulu, and Mazatlan. Fares start at $59 one-way ($118 round-trip), and must be booked at least 14 days in advance and by 11:59 p.m. PT on July 6. 
The sale's travel windows are as follows: 
Travel from Hawaii is valid Mondays - Thursdays during July 14 - August 18. Travel to Hawaii is valid Sundays - Wednesdays during July 14 - August 18. Travel to and from Mexico is valid Mondays - Thursdays during July 14 - August 18. Travel to and from all other destinations is valid Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Saturdays during July 14 - August 4. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
